name: Hakros Rotia (Map for Doom 2)
description:
Hello everyone, I present you ROTIA, a short but intense map with a total of 180 enemies and 5 secrets.

I hope you like it. :-D !!

Greetings.

--------------------------------------------------------

Instructions

  • Doom2.wad file required to play, just copy the file into 'games\' folder

--------------------------------------------------------

  • Name: Hakros Rotia
  • Version: 1.3
  • Format: UDMF
  • Port Needed: GZDoom
  • IWAD: Doom2.wad
  • Map: MAP01
  • Mods: No
  • Gameplay: Single player
  • Build Time: 1 weekend
  • Jumping &﻿ Crouching: Allowed
  • Freelook: Allowed
  • Difficulty settings: No
  • Dehacked file: No
  • Custom music: No
  • Custom textures: Yes (Included)
  • Enemies: 180
  • Secrets: 5

--------------------------------------------------------
